main_desc.message:
An open-source plugin.
Quickly search bookmarks and history.
Easily manage browsing records and filter out unnecessary records on the search page.

msg_more.message: More records not displayed, please narrow the search range

msg_processing.message: Processing, please do not close the page

ui_search_placehold.message: Enter keyword (enter to search locally, alt + enter to Google search)

ui_setting_hotkeys_desc.message:
Tab/↑/↓: Switch focus.
Enter: Perform search or open focused link.
Others: Input box will gain focus.

ui_setting_sites_tips.message:
* Manage your bookmarked websites here.
* Shows the date when the website was first recorded.
* The delete function here does not delete browser history but deletes the record entry.

ui_setting_about_content.message:
An open-source, free, and easy-to-use Chrome plugin.
	Source code: https://github.com/lalinking/webdiary
